text: Fun awon t’o gbagbo ni ododo, ti won si se awon ise rere ni iro idunnu pe, dajudaju awon Ogba Idera kan n be fun won, eyi ti awon odo n san ni isale re. Nigbakigba ti A ba p’ese jije-mimu kan fun won ninu eso re, won yoo so pe: “Eyi ni won ti pese fun wa teletele.” – Won mu un wa fun won ni irisi kan naa ni (amo pelu adun otooto). – Awon iyawo mimo si n be fun won ninu Ogba Idera. Olusegbere si ni won ninu re
